required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of HSK21542 in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single-Ascending-Dose Study To Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of a Kappa Receptor Agonist HSK21542 in Healthy Volunteers

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single-Ascending-Dose Study To Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of a kappa receptor agonist HSK21542 in Healthy Volunteers.
The study will enroll approximately 50 adults. The anticipated study duration will be up to 6 months.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-9 days after dosing
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HSK21542 in comparison with placebo after a single injection in healthy subjects in terms of adverse events

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination/ abnormal vital signs/ abnormal laboratory parameters
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-9 days after dosing
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of HSK21542 in comparison with placebo after a single injection in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal physical examination/ abnormal vital signs/ abnormal laboratory parameters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach maximum (peak) plasma concentration following drug administration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to time t.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent total body clearance of the drug from plasma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 24 hours after administration

intervention.description: Single dose, injection, starting dose of 0.2ug escalating up to 20ug
